Description: The city of Austin will hold a general election for the position of mayor on November 5, 2024. The position has term limits: two consecutive four-year terms, after which a candidate may run again after a four-year break.
Other_relevant_info: The city has a commitment to transparency and accountability in governance, with discussions on audits, public safety, affordable housing, and infrastructure.

Description: Chief executive of the city, responsible for overseeing city operations and implementing policies.
